title: Higher latitude chain (Lat 70.7, Long 307.9), Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field at Uummannaq, Greenland, 1 min, DTU network - R. Behlke & A.N. Willer (DTU Space, Denmark)

info.contact: R. Behlke & A.N. Willer @ DTU Space, Denmark

parameters.name: thg_mag_umq
parameters.description: Magnetic field B in HEZ vector components

parameters.name: thg_magh_umq
parameters.description: ---> H - Local magnetic North component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_umq']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magd_umq
parameters.description: ---> E - Local magnetic East component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_umq']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magz_umq
parameters.description: ---> Z - Local vertical down component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_umq']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
